data.Name: Holly Jacobs
data.staff_bio: Holly is a member of the research team at the Institute for Community Inclusion, where she contributes to the Vocational Rehabilitation Research and Training Center (VR-RRTC) project and The Substantial Gainful Activity (SGA) Project as a study coordinator. Holly holds a Master's degree from Boston College in Applied Developmental & Educational Psychology, with a focus in Research. She joined ICI after working for several years as a Vocational Counselor at a residential school for adolescents with traumatic brain injury in Brookline, MA.
data.staff_ed:
B.A., Psychology, Boston University
M.A., Applied Developmental & Educational Psychology, Boston College
